hadith.text: Narrated Zahdam: From Abu Musa who said: "I saw the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) eating chicken meat." He said: The Hadith has more statements that this. And this Hadith is Hasan Sahih. Ayyub As-Sakhtiyani also reported this Hadith from Al-Qasim At-Tamimi, and, from Abu Qilabah, from Zahdam Al-Jarmi
